name: Haunted Hotel: Eclipse
storyline:
What’s the first thing that comes to your mind when you hear about a haunted hotel? Most likely it is ghosts and poltergeists wandering from room to room with rattling chains and wailing.

But the Final Journey Hotel is of a different kind starting from its inhospitable name and ending with the most unusual creatures you can meet inside. What happens there might be beyond understanding of usual people but you and your friend detective James are the ones who can sort it all out. Save those who fell victim of the ancient battle, look for evidence and disclose the plot which is being worked out within the walls of this haunted hotel.
summary: You and your renowned partner James have been called to investigate a strange disturbance at a hotel, but the maid says the guests are all monsters. What’s happened here, and does she really mean that literally?
